str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Tomorrow. From epi and aurion; occurring on the succeeding day, i.e. to-morrow.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: To go out, come out. From ek and erchomai; to issue.
Of Chaldee origin; date-house; Beth-any, a place in Palestine.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To be hungry, needy, desire earnestly. From the same as penes; to famish; figuratively, to crave.
